The 100 Best Design Tools Ever

Typography

Fontface Ninja

https://Fontface.Ninja

Identify that cool font on the page you are browsing.

  • Google Fonts

    https://fonts.google.com/

    Find and use high quality fonts for your website.

  • TypeKit

    https://fonts.google.com/

    Get access to a bundle of premium fonts.

  • Fontstruct

    http://fontstruct.com/

    Create your own fonts from the ground up, pixel by pixel.

  • Typecast

    https://typecast.com/

    Create visual and semantic designs that put type first.

  • Font Squirrel

    https://www.fontsquirrel.com/

    Take advantage of the best database of free fonts.

  • 1001 Fonts

    https://www.1001fonts.com/

    Scan a huge library of fonts for personal orcommercial use.

  • What Font Is

    https://www.whatfontis.com/

    description

  • Typelight

    http://www.cr8software.net/typelight.html

    Edit and convert every Open Type Font.

  • Fontflame

    https://fontflame.com

    Tinder for fonts. Swipe to find the bestmatch.

Stock Photos

Pixabay

https://Pixabay.com

Browse and download high quality images under CCO license.

  • Unsplash

    https://unsplash.com

    et 10 new incredibly beautiful pictures everyday (CC0).

  • Stocksy

    https://Stocksy.com

    Download beautiful and distinctive royalty-free stock photos.

  • Pexels

    https://Pexels.com

    Get access to the best free stock photos.

  • Gratisography

    https://Gratisography.com

    Ryan McGuire takes thousands of exquisite pictures. Get them all. Free of use.

  • Adobe Stock

    https://stock.adobe.com

    Find the perfect asset for your creative project.

  • Zoomy

    https://Zoomyapp.com

    Free stock photos from different sources gathered in one desktop app.

  • New Old Stock

    https://nos.twnsnd.co

    Download vintage pictures from public archives.

  • SplitShire

    https://SplitShire.com

    Webdesigner Daniel Nanescu shares hundres of gorgeous CCO-licensed pictures.

  • Death To Stock Photos

    https://deathtostockphotos.com

    Receive original pictures in your email every month.

Stock Graphics

Illustrator

https://adobe.com

Build amazing vector art with this must-have tool.

  • Photoshop

    https://adobe.com

    Create and enhance your photographs, web designs and even your 3D artwork.

  • Daz Studio

    https:/daz3d.com

    Make incredibly realistic humans or animals in 3D.

  • DrawPlus

    https://serif.com

    Draw handsome vector art at a reasonable price.

  • Pixlr

    https://Pixlr.com

    Get access to 600 effects to retouch your pictures, free of charge.

  • Inkspace

    https://inkscape.org/en/

    The best open source alternative to Illustrator.

  • Aviary

    https://Aviary.com

    Edit your photos from a mobile app or from a web app.

  • Blender

    https://Blender.org

    Open source and entirely free 3D creation software.

  • Gimp

    https://gimp.org

    Free and open source editor to edit and retouch images.

  • Affinity Photo

    https://Affinity.serif.com

    Professional photo editing software. For Mac Only.

Infographics

Canva

https://Canva.com

Amazingly simple design graphic software to create any content you need.

  • Ease.ly

    https://Ease.ly

    Select among hunders of templates and create your own infograpics.

  • Infogram

    https://infogr.am

    Allows users to generate qualitative charts. Already used by the Huff Post.

  • Visage

    https://visage.co

    Design all kinds of visual content with their dazzling interface.

  • Visualize.me

    https://Visualize.me

    Your CV is boring? Turn it into an original infographic.

  • Venngage

    https://Venngage.com

    Make hundreds of infographics, media posts, and reports with thsi simple tool.

  • Draw.io

    https://draw.io

    A complete flowchart maker suitable for both internal and external projects.

  • Piktochart

    https://Piktochart.com

    Easy-to-use infographics maker, even if you're not a designer.

  • Visme

    https://Visme.co

    Transform your ideas into engaging content through their powerful tool.

  • Gliffy

    https://Gliffy.com

    Superb online diagramming tool that lets you collaborate with your team.

Collaboration

Invision

https://invisionapp.com

A simple prototyping and collaboration tool for design teams.

  • GoVisually

    https://GoVisually.com

    One of the best ways to collect client feedback for your projects.

  • Red Pen

    https://redpen.io

    The fastest feedback tool. Drag and drop your design and invite your friends.

  • Zeplin

    https://zeplin.io

    The ultimate collaboration tool between designers and developers.

  • Wake

    https://wake.com

    Share, review and discuss designs among your team. Airbnb uses it!

  • Marqueed

    https://Marqueed.com

    Mark-up and discuss images online. Pretty useful for Photoshop.

  • Cage

    https://cageapp.com

    A unique dashboard to collaborate with teams and clients.

  • Bounce

    https://bounceapp.com

    A fun and easy way to share ideas on any website.

  • Proofhub

    https://proofhub.com

    Manage your projects efficiently. Make sure your team collaborates and delivers.

  • Lingo

    https://lingoapp.com

    Build and share libraries of visual assets with your team. For Mac only.

Colors

Color Hunt

https://colorhunt.co

Browse through thousands of four-color combinations until you find the right one.

  • Adobe Color CC

    https://color.adobe.com

    Try, generate, and save various color schemes.

  • Coolors

    https://Coolors.co

    Scroll through the page and save your favorite palettes.

  • TinEye

    https://labs.tineye.com

    Determine your colors and search images with the perfect color combination.

  • ColorZilla

    https://colorzilla.com

    Super convenient extension to pick colors from a web.

  • Colicious

    https://Colicious.ga

    Press the space bar and generate a new color. Amusing and useful.

  • PaletteGenerator

    https://PaletteGenerator.com

    Generates a color palette for any image you find on the web.

  • Pictaculous

    https://Pictaculous.com

    Upload your image and get a compatible color palette.

  • The Color App

    Available on iTunes

    Finding colors become much easier with this large grid.

  • Unclrd

    https://Unclrd.com

    Browser extension that turns every website into black and white.

Inspiration

Dribbble

https://Dribbble.com

The place where designers share their most dazzling assets.

  • Muzli

    https://muz.li

    All the design inspiration you need straight in every new tab (browser extension).

  • Design You Trust

    https://designyoutrust.com

    Collective blog full of design portfolios and architectural inspirations.

  • Really Good Emails

    https://Catalog of well-designed emails to inspire you when building your newsletter.com

    description

  • Awwwards

    https://Awwwards.com

    Recognizes the talent and effort of the best designers, developers and agencies.

  • One Page Love

    https://onepagelove.com

    Original showcase of elegant one-page websites.

  • Site See

    https://sitesee.co

    Curated galler of beautiful, modern websites from all around the world.

  • Designspiration

    https://Designspiration.net

    Pinterest-style board of high level design inspiration to share.

  • Material Up

    https://Material.uplabs.com

    Curates the best design materials available online everyday.

  • Mobile Patters

    https://mobile-patterns.com

    Learn how to overcome UX flows for your mobile app.

Illustrator

https://adobe.com

Build amazing vector art with this must-have tool.

  • Photoshop

    https://adobe.com

    Create and enhance your photographs, web designs and even your 3D artwork.

  • Daz Studio

    https:/daz3d.com

    Make incredibly realistic humans or animals in 3D.

  • DrawPlus

    https://serif.com

    Draw handsome vector art at a reasonable price.

  • Pixlr

    https://Pixlr.com

    Get access to 600 effects to retouch your pictures, free of charge.

  • Inkspace

    https://inkscape.org/en/

    The best open source alternative to Illustrator.

  • Aviary

    https://Aviary.com

    Edit your photos from a mobile app or from a web app.

  • Blender

    https://Blender.org

    Open source and entirely free 3D creation software.

  • Gimp

    https://gimp.org

    Free and open source editor to edit and retouch images.

  • Affinity Photo

    https://Affinity.serif.com

    Professional photo editing software. For Mac Only.

Logo Design

SquareSpace

https://logo.SquareSpace.com

This tool combines SquareSpace expertise and nounproject icons to let you make a cool logo.

  • Designmantic

    https://Designmantic.com

    Enter your company name, select your industry, and generate an editable logo.

  • Graphic Springs

    https://graphicsprings.com

    Choose a logo template, edit it, and download your logo.

  • Logo Genie

    https://logogenie.net

    Logo Genie makes logo design easy and fun.

  • Logo Makr

    https://logomakr.com

    Create a simple logo with flaticon materials.

  • Logo Type Makr

    https://logotypemakr.com

    Random generation of logos for your company.

  • Logo Garden

    https://logogarden.com

    Select the industry you're working in and choose one of the generated logos.

  • Logoshi

    https://Logoshi.com

    Draw a messy sketch and get a clean modern logo.

  • Logaster

    https://Logaster.com

    Make a decent logo without any design skills.

  • Logo Maker

    https://logomaker.com

    Generate hundreds of potential logos and modify them online.

Prototyping

Sketch

https://sketchapp.com

A vector design too convenient for UI and UX. Only compatible with Mac.

  • Napkin

    https://designwithnapkin.com

    Design quick mockups on your iOS device.

  • Flinto

    https://flinto.com

    Sketch interactive prototypes from static images.

  • ProtoIO

    https://proto.io

    Make ultra realistic app prototypes. No coding required.

  • Weld

    https://weld.io

    Draw your website online, the way you want it.

  • Balsamiq

    https://Balsamiq.com

    Quick wireframing tool that lets you make clear mockups.

  • App Cooker

    https://appcooker.net

    Handle mockups and prototypes from your iPad.

  • Atomic

    https://atomic.io

    Design realistic prototypes you can share with your team.

  • HTML5 Up

    https://html5up.net

    Create classy, customizable and responsive HTML 5 templates.

  • Axure

    https://Axure.com

    Quickly design prototypes from your computer and share them.
